ExtDesc.message: Addon for managing tabs, containers (contextual identities) and bookmarks in sidebar. Supports both flat and tree tabs layouts, per-container include/exclude rules, proxy configs for each container and much more.

KbOpenNewTabInCurrPanel.message: Open new tab in active panel

KbOpenNewTabAfter.message: Open new tab after active tab

KbOpenNewTabAsFirstChild.message: Open new tab as the first child of active tab

KbOpenNewTabAsLastChild.message: Open new tab as the last child of active tab

KbRm.message: Remove selected items or active tab

KbActPanelPrevActTab.message: Activate previous active tab of active panel

KbMoveTabToAct.message: Move selected tabs to the active tab
